Manage your crypto without limitations.

## All in one app

## Wallet

HODL BTC, ETH, BNB, and hundreds of other cryptocurrencies on the secure
crypto wallet.

## Bridge

Swap your crypto from one  
blockchain to another. Bridge your assets 1:1.

## DEX

Komodo Wallet supports trading for 99% of cryptocurrencies. Trade crypto P2P
without intermediaries.

## Secure trading platform

Atomic swaps are designed such that both traders either receive the funds they
desire, or nothing happens at all and both traders retain the funds they
started with.

Start swap

YOUR KEYS

YOUR COINS

YOUR KEYS

YOUR COINS

New Level of Security and Decentralization

Peer-to-Peer Trading,  
No Middleman

No trading fee for makers,  
takers only pay 0.13%

Start trading immediately,  
no deposit or withdrawal wait times

Unrestricted trading pairs,  
swap all assets directly

## Let's try DEX

Download the app on your phone, tablet or desktop. Upgrade your DEXperience!

Launch app Download app

## Join our community

Hang out with the community, get acquainted and just share  
knowledge from the crypto world in our social media

Discord

Twitter

Reddit

Telegram
